projects.name: Movie Review and Recommender Website
projects.description: Utilized Python and Flask to create a backend system, handling data processing and serving recommendations. Integrated the OMDB API to fetch detailed movie information, enhancing the user experience with comprehensive data. Leveraged Pandas and Scikit-learn for machine learning tasks, specifically employing count vectorization for the recommendation system.

projects.name: CO2 Emissions ML Project
projects.description: Implemented a Machine Learning project to predict CO2 emission levels using various algorithms including Linear Regression, Random Forest, and Gradient Boosting. Performed extensive data preprocessing to clean and prepare the dataset for training and testing the machine learning models. Visualized the correlation between different features and the target variable using Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly to gain insights into the data. Optimized the hyperparameters of the models to achieve higher accuracy and better performance metrics.

experiences.description: Collaborated with a project manager to translate Figma designs into functional and visually appealing web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Developed and optimized dynamic, responsive web pages with React, ensuring cross-browser compatibility, high performance, and adherence to requirements and design specifications. Participated in code reviews, debugging, and iterative development, which improved code quality, project maintainability, and contributed to a 20% increase in user engagement.

Led and managed a team of 10 consultants, overseeing end-to-end consulting projects. Enhanced volunteer engagement for non-profit organizations by an average of 40% through strategic consulting initiatives. Conducted workshops and training sessions to improve junior consultants understanding of consulting methodologies, resulting in an 80% increase in project contribution efficiency.
